metadata.title: CVE-2018-8956 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: ntpd in ntp 4.2.8p10, 4.2.8p11, 4.2.8p12 and 4.2.8p13 allow remoteattackers to prevent a broadcast client from synchronizing its clock with abroadcast NTP server via soofed mode 3 and mode 5 packets. The attackermust either be a part of the same broadcast network or control a slave inthat broadcast network that can capture certain required packets on theattacker's behalf and send them to the attacker.

criterions.comment: ntp package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
